title: Prostitution-related nuisance abatement (Superior Court Of The District Of Columbia)

communications.communication:
To Whom it may concern,
Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all records for the past four months (1/10/2024 through 5/10/2024) on complaints filed in the Civil Branch of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia for the purpose of abating prostitution related nuisances as referenced in Chapter 31. Drug-, Firearm-, or Prostitution-Related Nuisance Abatement of the DC city code.  

Please provide any and all written records (including but not limited to hard-copy documents, memos, emails, word processor documents, PDF documents, PowerPoint files, images files, video files etc.) regarding these complaints  including but not limited to:

- Information on prostitution-related properties obtained from law enforcement agencies 
- The complaint itself or an affidavit attached thereto shall describe the adverse impact of the prostitution-related nuisance upon the surrounding community
-Motions for preliminary injunctions filed for the purpose of preventing prostitution-related nuisances 

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would 
prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request.
Sincerely,
Jenny Wadhwa

title: Crime Free Training Program: Lakewood Police Department

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Crime Free Training Program: Lakewood Police Department
communications.communication:
Hello,
Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following documents regarding your Crime Free Training Program:

A copy of any and all training materials used in the past year (4/1/2023-4/1/2024)

This information will not be used for commercial purposes and I look forward to hearing from you.

Kindly,
Jenny Wadhwa

communications.subject: North Carolina Public Records Law Request: Fayetteville Police Department Request
communications.communication:
To Whom it may concern,
Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:
Any and all records from the past year regarding your nuisance property ordinance that will be referred to as ordinance in this request but could be known (but not limited to) as Rental Action Management Plan as described in Sec. 14-95 of the city code.
Please provide any and all written records (including but not limited to hard-copy documents, memos, emails, word processor documents, PDF documents, PowerPoint files, images files, video files etc.) regarding the Ordinance including but not limited to:
• police calls, reports, citations, or arrests, collected by the municipality police department for the purpose of enforcing the ordinance
The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.
Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request.
Sincerely,
Jenny Wadhwa
